definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: Slip away to innocent days with this fantastically fun collection of jigsaws with a nostalgic theme.
sentences.chinese: 溜掉無辜天這個親密樂趣收集靈感與懷舊主題。

sentences.english: I think the voice urging Liu Haisu autumn, there is a sense of urgency.
sentences.chinese: 想是秋聲催慄感，不教懷舊轉懷新。

sentences.english: Nostalgia nostalgic old people things, like recalling the good old days.
sentences.chinese: 懷舊人老戀舊事，喜歡追憶過去的美好時光。

sentences.english: Interactive game e-card with a retro and dark style.
sentences.chinese: 懷舊設計風格的互動遊戲電子賀卡。

sentences.english: There was no need to mention, and it seemed as if the man Transo had no interest in reminiscence.
sentences.chinese: 過去的就別再提了，男常潮似乎對懷舊毫無興趣。

sentences.english: Its been ten years since i last visited, a little nostalgia swept over me.
sentences.chinese: 從我上次去那裏已經有十年了，懷舊感席捲了我。

sentences.english: The most luxurious outdoor home theaters are nostalgic reminders of the drive-in theaters of old.
sentences.chinese: 最奢華的戶外電影院是老式汽車影院的懷舊翻版。
Siri的感覺就像懷舊風格的蘋果。

sentences.english: Would you get sleepy, feel nostalgic, suddenly desire some cold soup?
sentences.chinese: 你會困，感到懷舊，突然想喝冷湯？

sentences.english: Combinations of laser cutting, vintage techniques & fine yarns in corded effects.
sentences.chinese: 混合激光剪裁，懷舊技術和精紗塑造立體效果。

sentences.english: The most subtle dialectics always end in nostalgia.
sentences.chinese: 最爲精巧的辯證法總是結尾於懷舊。

sentences.english: The old hand-held storm lantern has become a decoration which reminds one of old times.
sentences.chinese: 老式玻璃風燈，如今成了懷舊的裝飾品。

sentences.english: Is there any nostalgia more powerful than the feelings of a third grader revisiting his or her kindergarten classroom?
sentences.chinese: 有什麼比一個三年級孩子重遊幼兒園教室更懷舊的嗎？

sentences.english: I'm hoping to invoke a sense of nostalgia with "Childhood Sweethearts."
sentences.chinese: 我希望援引甜心童年的懷舊感以”。

sentences.english: Touring Shaoxing will be a nostalgia trip of his culture.
sentences.chinese: 遊覽紹興，也許就是一次魯迅文化的懷舊之旅。

sentences.english: Yes, for Wang Yin , it"s time to be "reminiscent.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，對王音來說，是到了“懷舊”的時候了。

definition: to cherish the memory of/to think of/reminisce

to return to old ways (a Confucian aspiration)/to turn back the clock/neoclassical school during Tang and Song associated with classical writing 古文/retro (fashion style based on nostalgia, esp. for 1960s)
